Rule.Name: Ensure dccp kernel module is not available (Automated)
Rule.NonCompliantComment: The dccp kernel module is available, increasing the attack surface.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Disable the dccp kernel module by blacklisting it and preventing its loading.
Rule.Correction: echo "install dccp /bin/false" >> /etc/modprobe.d/dccp.conf; echo "blacklist dccp" >> /etc/modprobe.d/dccp.conf; modprobe -r dccp
